name: Dark Compact
description:
Combination of several style which restyles and resizes the player for maximum viewing area while retaining chat.  Site restyled to be a darker theme.  Video area enlarged and elements shifted to make video screen as large as possible.

- left menu hides, shows up on mouse over (move mouse to left edge)
- darker theme throughout site
- chat menu size configurable
- elements moved around the screen to maximize viewing area.
additional_info: 6/26/2017 - Updated to work with latest twitch layout.
